price: Na tukawafanya maimamu wakiongoa watu kwa amri yetu. Na tukawafunulia watende kheri, na washike Swala, na watoe Zaka; na walikuwa wanatuabudu Sisi tu.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَهۡدُونَ بِأَمۡرِنَا وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمۡ فِعۡلَ ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَإِقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِۖ وَكَانُواْ لَنَا عَٰبِدِينَ
footnotes: Na tukawafanya ni Manabii wakiwaendea watu, wakiwaongoa kwenye kheri kwa mujibu wa tulivyo waamrisha. Na tukawaonyesha vitendo vyema, na kudumisha Swala kama inavyo faa, na kutoa Zaka. Na wakawa wanatunyenyekea na kutusafia ibada Sisi tu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnāhum a-immatan yahdūna bi-amrinā wa-awḥaynā ilayhim fiʿ'la al-khayrāti wa-iqāma al-ṣalati waītāa al-zakati wakānū lanā ʿābidīna
